content.body: Is there a way to view a rendered version of pull requests to ECMA-262, preferably with marked-up deltas? For example, reading a rendered version of https://github.com/tc39/ecma262/pull/2942/files.
jschoi: at the bottom, click "show all checks", then scroll down to "Begin.com build preview — Preview ready!" and click the "details" button
content.formatted_body: jschoi: at the bottom, click "show all checks", then scroll down to "Begin.com build preview — Preview ready!" and click the "details" button

content.body: for rendered _diffs_, you can use https://arai-a.github.io/ecma262-compare/
content.formatted_body: for rendered diffs, you can use https://arai-a.github.io/ecma262-compare/
